gw.api.util

Class MultiCurrencySummation

  • gw.api.util.MultiCurrencySummation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class MultiCurrencySummation
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    A multi-currency summation utility class. Supports summing monetary amounts in different currencies. Monetary amounts are added to the summation after which the summation value in a specified currency can be calculated using the {@link FXRateUtil} to perform the conversions.

    • Field Summary
